verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:1
verses.text: Adam, Sheth, Enosh,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:2
verses.text: Kenan, Mahalaleel, Jered,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:3
verses.text: Henoch, Methuselah, Lamech,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:4
verses.text: Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:5
verses.text: The sons of Japheth; Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:6
verses.text: And the sons of Gomer; Ashchenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:7
verses.text: And the sons of Javan; Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Dodanim.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:8
verses.text: The sons of Ham; Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:9
verses.text: And the sons of Cush; Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raamah, and Sabtecha. And the sons of Raamah; Sheba, and Dedan.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:10
verses.text: And Cush begat Nimrod: he began to be mighty upon the earth.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:11
verses.text: And Mizraim begat Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:12
verses.text: And Pathrusim, and Casluhim, (of whom came the Philistines,) and Caphthorim.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:13
verses.text: And Canaan begat Zidon his firstborn, and Heth,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:14
verses.text: The Jebusite also, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:15
verses.text: And the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:16
verses.text: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:17
verses.text: The sons of Shem; Elam, and Asshur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:18
verses.text: And Arphaxad begat Shelah, and Shelah begat Eber.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:19
verses.text: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of the one was Peleg; because in his days the earth was divided: and his brother’s name was Joktan.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:20
verses.text: And Joktan begat Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:21
verses.text: Hadoram also, and Uzal, and Diklah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:22
verses.text: And Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:23
verses.text: And Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the sons of Joktan.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:24
verses.text: Shem, Arphaxad, Shelah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:25
verses.text: Eber, Peleg, Reu,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:26
verses.text: Serug, Nahor, Terah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:27
verses.text: Abram; the same is Abraham.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:28
verses.text: The sons of Abraham; Isaac, and Ishmael.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:29
verses.text: These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:30
verses.text: Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:31
verses.text: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:32
verses.text: Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham’s concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:33
verses.text: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these are the sons of Keturah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:34
verses.text: And Abraham begat Isaac. The sons of Isaac; Esau and Israel.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:35
verses.text: The sons of Esau; Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jaalam, and Korah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:36
verses.text: The sons of Eliphaz; Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:37
verses.text: The sons of Reuel; Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:38
verses.text: And the sons of Seir; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:39
verses.text: And the sons of Lotan; Hori, and Homam: and Timna was Lotan’s sister.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:40
verses.text: The sons of Shobal; Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the sons of Zibeon; Aiah, and Anah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:41
verses.text: The sons of Anah; Dishon. And the sons of Dishon; Amram, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:42
verses.text: The sons of Ezer; Bilhan, and Zavan, and Jakan. The sons of Dishan; Uz, and Aran.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:43
verses.text: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom before any king reigned over the children of Israel; Bela the son of Beor: and the name of his city was Dinhabah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:44
verses.text: And when Bela was dead, Jobab the son of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in his stead.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:45
verses.text: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:46
verses.text: And when Husham was dead, Hadad the son of Bedad, which smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:47
verses.text: And when Hadad was dead, Samlah of Masrekah reigned in his stead.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:48
verses.text: And when Samlah was dead, Shaul of Rehoboth by the river reigned in his stead.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:49
verses.text: And when Shaul was dead, Baal–hanan the son of Achbor reigned in his stead.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:50
verses.text: And when Baal–hanan was dead, Hadad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Pai; and his wife’s name was Mehetabel, the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezahab.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:51
verses.text: Hadad died also. And the dukes of Edom were; duke Timnah, duke Aliah, duke Jetheth,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:52
verses.text: Duke Aholibamah, duke Elah, duke Pinon,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:53
verses.text: Duke Kenaz, duke Teman, duke Mibzar,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 1:54
verses.text: Duke Magdiel, duke Iram. These are the dukes of Edom.
